== Introduction ==

These release notes for Kubuntu 24.04 (Noble Numbat) provide an overview of the release and document the known issues.

Details of the changes in the Ubuntu base, including kernel, toolchain and build options can be found in the main <nowiki>[[https://discourse.ubuntu.com/t/noble-numbat-release-notes/39890|Ubuntu Release Notes]]</nowiki>. 

== Support lifespan ==

Kubuntu 24.04 will be supported for 3 years.

== Getting Kubuntu 24.04 LTS ==

=== Upgrading from 22.04 or 23.10 ===

Detailed upgrade instructions can be found here: <nowiki>[[https://help.ubuntu.com/community/NobleUpgrades/Kubuntu]]</nowiki>

=== Download a Disk Image ===

Download a <nowiki>[[http://cdimage.ubuntu.com/kubuntu/releases/24.04/release/|Bootable image]]</nowiki>. Direct downloads, torrents, and zysnc are available as options.

== New features and changes in 24.04 ==
=== Core desktop and applications ===

==== Plasma 5.27: simple by default, powerful when needed ====

<nowiki>[[File:NoblePlasma.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

<nowiki>[[https://kde.org/announcements/plasma/5/5.27.11/|Plasma 5.27.11]]</nowiki> has been developed to make it smoother to use while retaining the familiar setup.

Kubuntu 24.04 ships the 11th scheduled bugfix release of KDE Plasma 5.27 (5.27.11).
Kubuntu 24.04 ships the latest Frameworks 5 release of 5.115.0

==== KDE Apps updates, including KDE Gear 23.08 and other updated apps ====

<nowiki>[[File:NobleApps.png||width=800]]</nowiki>

==== Web browser and office suite ====

* <nowiki>[[https://www.mozilla.org/en-US/firefox/117.0/releasenotes//|Firefox 117]]</nowiki> snap is the default browser from the <nowiki>[[https://snapcraft.io/firefox|Snap Store]]</nowiki>.
* <nowiki>[[https://wiki.documentfoundation.org/ReleaseNotes/24.2|LibreOffice 24.2]]</nowiki> is provided by default in the full installation.

==== Qt ====

Kubuntu 24.04 ships with Qt 5.15.13

=== Other new and updated applications in the Ubuntu archive ===

* KDEs own Haruna and Elisa is now installed by default.
* KDE applications are updated to the latest 23.08.5
* DigiKam is at 8.2

== Other highlights/notes ==

=== Plasma Wayland session ===

* A Plasma Wayland session is available for testing by installing the plasma-workspace-wayland package, but is not supported. A Wayland session can then be started by selecting it at the login screen.
